tables.name: Category
tables.def:
CREATE TABLE "Category" (
  "id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  "name" TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL
)

tables.name: Customer
tables.def:
CREATE TABLE "Customer" (
  "id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  "email" TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  "password" TEXT NOT NULL,
  "name" TEXT NOT NULL,
  "country" TEXT NOT NULL,
  "address" TEXT NOT NULL
)

tables.name: Order

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 0)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (customer) REFERENCES Customer (id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE MATCH NONE

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE "Order" (
  "id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  "state" TEXT NOT NULL,
  "date_created" DATETIME NOT NULL,
  "date_shipped" DATETIME,
  "date_delivered" DATETIME,
  "total_price" DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL,
  "customer" INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES "Customer" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE
)

tables.name: Product
tables.def:
CREATE TABLE "Product" (
  "id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  "name" TEXT NOT NULL,
  "description" TEXT NOT NULL,
  "picture" BLOB,
  "price" DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL,
  "quantity" INTEGER NOT NULL
)

tables.name: CartItem

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 0)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (product) REFERENCES Product (id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE MATCH NONE

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 1)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (customer) REFERENCES Customer (id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE MATCH NONE

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE "CartItem" (
  "id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  "quantity" INTEGER NOT NULL,
  "customer" INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES "Customer" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE,
  "product" INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES "Product" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE
)

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE "Category_Product" (
  "category" INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES "Category" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE,
  "product" INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES "Product" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE,
  PRIMARY KEY ("category", "product")
)

tables.def:

  "quantity" INTEGER NOT NULL,
  "price" DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL,
  "order" INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES "Order" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE,
  "product" INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES "Product" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE,
